predicate.note: Frames file for 'sense' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison to 'see' and 'hear' and 'feel'.

example.name: well that's a boring example
example.text: ``I sense that some people are reluctant to stick their necks out in any aggressive way until after the figures come out,'' said Richard Eakle, president of Eakle Associates, Fair Haven, Conn.
example.arg: some people are reluctant to stick their necks out in any aggressive way until after the figures come out
